subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: As popular as Derek Jeter is and as supremely talented as Alex Rodriguez is, the most indispensable Yankee on the field Tuesday will, as always, be Mariano Rivera.
snippet: As popular as Derek Jeter is and as supremely talented as Alex Rodriguez is, the most indispensable Yankee on the field Tuesday will, as always, be Mariano Rivera.
